oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Convent and Chapel
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Convents; Buildings; Nuns
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Coming from Mexico, the Lasallian Oblates of Guadalupe moved into their convent on the campus on August 16, 1961.
Under the direction of Sister William, the Sisters managed the domestic services for CBC.
The order was founded in 1945. Their rules, regulations, and habit were modelled on the Brothers'.
